mapper.select: SELECT NO , CHAT_FROM , CHAT_TO , CONTENT FROM YOMUL_CHATS WHERE CHAT_FROM = #{no} OR CHAT_TO = #{no} ORDER BY CDATE

SELECT CHAT_FROM , MAX(CDATE) CDATE FROM ( SELECT CHAT_TO AS CHAT_FROM , CDATE FROM YOMUL_CHATS WHERE CHAT_FROM = #{no} UNION SELECT CHAT_FROM AS CHAT_FROM , CDATE FROM YOMUL_CHATS WHERE CHAT_TO = #{no} ) GROUP BY CHAT_FROM ORDER BY CDATE DESC
